com.ihordev.core.repositories

Class RepositoryQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihordev.core.repositories.RepositoryQueries

  • public class RepositoryQueries
extends Object

    A class with template repository methods for retrieving data. It's methods use query templates and implements common data access logic as much as possible, trying to preserve the possibility to customise some behavior.

    Depending on repository method, customisable options can include any of options specified in list below:

    1. queryResultClass - the class of instances returned by repository method, can be DTO or Spring Data JPA projection;
    2. custom entity classes - the entities that is used in FROM clause of the query;
    3. queryArgsMap - the map containing query named parameters;
    4. customClausesMap - the map that contains custom JPQL query clauses.

    • Method Detail

      • findEntitiesAsPageItems

        public <T> Slice<T> findEntitiesAsPageItems(Class<T> queryResultClass,
                                            Class<?> entityClass,
                                            Class<?> entityL10nClass,
                                            Map<String,String> customClausesMap,
                                            Map<String,Object> queryArgsMap,
                                            Pageable pageRequest)

        Retrieves page of specified entities using query template: 

         SELECT [selectClause]
   FROM [fromClauseStart] ? [entity] [entityAlias]!
   JOIN [entityAlias].[entityL10nAsProp] [entityL10nAlias]
   JOIN [entityL10nAlias].language lang
   [fromClauseEnd]
   WHERE [whereClause] ? ([whereClause]) AND :!
         (lang.name = \\:language
            OR lang.name = function('DEFAULT_LANGUAGE',)
               AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [entityL10n] [entityL10nAlias]
                                 WHERE [entityL10nAlias].[entityAsProp] = [entityAsProp]
                                       AND [entityL10nAlias].language = (SELECT lang
                                                                           FROM Language lang
                                                                           WHERE name = \\:language)))
   [orderByClause] ? ORDER BY [orderByClause] :!

        Where:

        1. Query clauses "selectClause" and "orderByClause" are optional and by default automatically created by QueryTemplateUtils and substituted.
        2. Query clause "whereClause" is mandatory and must be provided by user.
        3. Template variables [entity, entityAlias, entityL10nAsProp, entityL10nAlias, entityL10n, entityAsProp] are created automatically by QueryTemplateUtils from entity classes in FROM clause that are passed as arguments to this method.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the returned instances type parameter
        Parameters:
        queryResultClass - the class of returned instances. Can be DTO or Spring Data JPA projection
        entityClass - the primary entity that is queried for data
        entityL10nClass - the localization entity to localize primary entity
        customClausesMap - the map containing custom query clauses
        queryArgsMap - the map containing named query parameters
        pageRequest - the object that contains information about page
        Returns:
        page of entities instances

      • findCurrentMusicEntityById

        public <T> T findCurrentMusicEntityById(Class<T> queryResultClass,
                                        Class<?> entityClass,
                                        Class<?> entityL10nClass,
                                        Map<String,Object> queryArgsMap)
        Retrieves one entity instance as current music entity by id using query template: 
         SELECT [selectClause]
   FROM [fromClauseStart] ? [entity] [entityAlias]!
   JOIN [entityAlias].[entityL10nAsProp] [entityL10nAlias]
   JOIN [entityL10nAlias].language lang
   [fromClauseEnd]
   WHERE [whereClause] ? ([whereClause]) AND :!
         (lang.name = \\:language
            OR lang.name = function('DEFAULT_LANGUAGE',)
               AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [entityL10n] [entityL10nAlias]
                                 WHERE [entityL10nAlias].[entityAsProp] = [entityAsProp]
                                       AND [entityL10nAlias].language = (SELECT lang
                                                                           FROM Language lang
                                                                           WHERE name = \\:language)))
   [orderByClause] ? ORDER BY [orderByClause] :!

        Where:

        1. Query clause "selectClause" are automatically created by QueryTemplateUtils and substituted;
        2. Query clause "whereClause" is resolved with nested template "[entityAlias].id = \:[entityAsArg]Id".
        3. Template variables [entity, entityAlias, entityL10nAsProp, entityL10nAlias, entityL10n, entityAsProp] are created automatically by QueryTemplateUtils from entity classes in FROM clause that are passed as arguments to this method.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the returned instances type parameter
        Parameters:
        queryResultClass - the class of returned instance. Can DTO or Spring Data JPA projection
        entityClass - the primary entity that is queried for data
        entityL10nClass - the localization entity to localize primary entity
        queryArgsMap - the map containing named query parameters
        Returns:
        current music entity

      • findEntityL10n

        public <T> T findEntityL10n(Class<T> entityL10nClass,
                            Class<?> entityClass,
                            Map<String,Object> queryArgsMap)
        Retrieves localization entity instance for entity by it's id using query template: 
         SELECT [selectClause]
   FROM [fromClauseStart] ? [entity] [entityAlias]!
   JOIN [entityAlias].[entityL10nAsProp] [entityL10nAlias]
   JOIN [entityL10nAlias].language lang
   [fromClauseEnd]
   WHERE [whereClause] ? ([whereClause]) AND :!
         (lang.name = \\:language
            OR lang.name = function('DEFAULT_LANGUAGE',)
               AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [entityL10n] [entityL10nAlias]
                                 WHERE [entityL10nAlias].[entityAsProp] = [entityAsProp]
                                       AND [entityL10nAlias].language = (SELECT lang
                                                                           FROM Language lang
                                                                           WHERE name = \\:language)))
   [orderByClause] ? ORDER BY [orderByClause] :!

        Where:

        1. Query clause "selectClause" are set with value returned from EntityVariable.getAsAliasValue();
        2. Query clause "whereClause" is resolved with nested template "[entityAlias].id = \:[entityAsArg]Id".
        3. Template variables [entity, entityAlias, entityL10nAsProp, entityL10nAlias, entityL10n, entityAsProp] are created automatically by QueryTemplateUtils from entity classes in FROM clause that are passed as arguments to this method.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity localization type parameter
        Parameters:
        entityL10nClass - the class of entity localization.
        entityClass - the entity for which localization entity must be found
        queryArgsMap - the map containing named query parameters
        Returns:
        page of entities instances
